text_logic_form: The triangles $JLM$ and $QST$ are similar to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangles $JLM$ and $QST$ are similar to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $LJM$ is equal to the measure of angle $TSQ$.
The measure of angle $JML$ is equal to the measure of angle $STQ$.
The length of the line $MJ$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $TQ$ is $2$ units.
The length of the line $SQ$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $ML$ is $6x - 3$ units.
The length of the line $JL$ is $3y - 2$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $JL$, $JM$, $ML$, forming the triangle $JLM$.
There are lines $SQ$, $ST$, $TQ$, forming the triangle $QST$.
